name: correct
text: but even it isnâ€™t, correct your mistakes

name: complete
text: Give the receiver a complete understanding of what you are discussing

name: concrete
text: Be concrete in your ideas by giving the right amount of detail

name: concise
text: Be concise in your articulation by being precise and simple

name: coherent
text: Be coherent in your speech with logic and smooth flow of information

name: courteous
text: Show a courteous attitude by being polite, friendly, and open while communicating with others

name: clear
text: Be clear in your thoughts so your goals are communicated clearly too.
